<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/people/remove/start"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Starts the data deletion for the user with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["userId"],"type":"object","properties":{"userId":{"type":"string","description":"The user ID whose data is reassigned/removed.","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for terminating the reassignment/deletion process.","title":"TerminateRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Deletion progress","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"required":["id","isCompleted","percentage","status"],"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"The task progress ID.","nullable":true,"example":"9846"},"error":{"type":"string","description":"The task progress error message.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"percentage":{"type":"integer","description":"The percentage of the task progress.","format":"int32","example":1234},"isCompleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies if the task peogress is completed or not.","example":true},"status":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["Created","Running","Completed","Canceled","Failted"],"type":"string","description":"[Created - Created, Running - Running, Completed - Completed, Canceled - Canceled, Failted - Failted]","example":"Created"},{"enum":[0,1,2,3,4],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - Created, 1 - Running, 2 - Completed, 3 - Canceled, 4 - Failted]","example":0,"x-enum-varnames":["Created","Running","Completed","Canceled","Failted"],"x-enum-descriptions":["Created","Running","Completed","Canceled","Failted"]}],"x-enum-type":"integer","title":"DistributedTaskStatus"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The task progress response parameters.","title":"TaskProgressResponseDto"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"TaskProgressResponseWrapper"}}}},"400":{"description":"User exception"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"No permissions to perform this action"},"404":{"description":"User not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
